title: Direction of particle from velocity function

content.question: The velocity of a particle moving along the x-axis is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>v</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <msqrt> <mi>t</mi> </msqrt> <mo>−</mo> <mi>cos</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>t</mi> </msup> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG2bWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp daGcaaWdaeaapeGaamiDaaWcbeaakiabgkHiTiGacogacaGGVbGaai 4Camaabmaapaqaa8qacaWGLbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaadshaaaaa kiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@4396@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for t ≥ 0. Which of the following statements describes the motion of the particle at t = 1?

choices.label: The particle is moving to the left with positive acceleration.
The particle is moving to the right with positive acceleration.
The particle is moving to the left with negative acceleration.
The particle is moving to the right with negative acceleration.

content.answer: The particle is moving to the right with positive acceleration.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
